Summary I joined Google in September 2010 and am currently working as an Agency Account Strategist for small and medium business sales in the NA region. In my previous roles at Google, I have worked in SMB Sales for the AU/NZ region and have also worked in the Ad Review Operations function before moving in to sales. Prior to Google, I worked as a Relationship Manager in the Global Private Clients Group (Private Banking) with ICICI Bank Ltd. in Hyderabad, India between July 2008 to September 2010.  
 
I hold an MBA from the ICFAI Business School, Hyderabad and a B.Com. (Hons.) degree from the Bhawanipur Education Society College, Calcutta University. I also hold a Diploma in Mass Communication from the Birla Institute of Liberal Arts & Management Sciences, Kolkata.  
 
Usually like to describe myself as a jack of all trades, always looking to try my hand at different activities. I am a big time Bollywood movie buff, cricket enthusiast and my claim to fame is jumping off a plane from 18000 feet (the world's highest tandem jump). Experience Agency Account Strategist, NA SMB Sales Google April 2015  – Present (5 months) Mountain View, California Agency Account Strategist, AU/NZ SMB Sales Google January 2014  –  March 2015  (1 year 3 months) Hyderabad Area, India - Consistently deliver against assigned agency quota and product adoption metrics. 
- Identify key agency stakeholders (often Directors or C-level), and educate proactively on Google’s solutions to drive increase in annual digital marketing budgets. 
- Engagement on specific accounts to drive Google product adoption, understanding and usage.  
- Develop creative ways to drive agency development, knowledge of Google products and implementation of plans across SMB client portfolio. 
- Through direct exposure with agency partners, share and collaborate with Specialists, Engineers, and Product team members on new feature development. 
- Proactively coach peers to create skill lift that drives agency and client growth and contributes to overall team success. 
- Partner with management to define program opportunities and challenges and drive change where needed. Summary I work as an Operations Specialist in a Central Team at Google India Pvt Ltd. We work with client facing teams across the globe & help them in defining the operations & processes to help Google AdWords users get the best out of their accounts.  
 
Specialties: Working with a global team on various projects which needs a lot of stakeholder management, strategic thinking & operational excellence.  
 
Expertise in operations, project management, expertise in internal platforms, stakeholder management.  Summary I work as an Operations Specialist in a Central Team at Google India Pvt Ltd. Experience Global Operations & Process Systems (GOPS) Specialist Google July 2014  – Present (1 year 2 months) Hyderabad Area, India Account Manager - India Channel Sales Google April 2014  –  June 2014  (3 months) New Delhi Area, India As an Account Manager in the Channel Sales Team, we work with our channel partners team to get more users to Google AdWords along with helping and guiding them in managing their existing accounts.  
 
Specialties: Worked with large businesses and agencies on various objectives, such as branding, direct response, website usability, profitability modeling, mobile app creative concepts and video & display strategy to get more users in AdWords. 
 
Expertise in digital marketing, advertising across platforms such as Search, Display, Mobile, YouTube and Social, as well as driving analytical performance management. 
 
A brief summary of my role is as below:  
 
- The first point of contact for partners around all key areas and lead cross-functional effort (marketing, sales engineering, account management, training) to identify and solve roadblocks 
- Develop strategic account plans for partners with an eye toward identifying creative and revenue-generating initiatives 
- Define and drive implementation of performance improvement initiatives for specific partners based on detailed understanding of the partners’ business and available Google tools 
- Ensure that partners are fulfilling their contractual obligations and that Google is providing the required support for them to do so 
- Manage trusted relationships with partners and develop a thorough understanding of partners’ business challenges ​ 
- Lead ad hoc projects that focus on the strategic growth of the program AdWords Strategist Google May 2013  –  March 2014  (11 months) Hyderabad Area, India Once I got promoted, I got an opportunity to be in the shoes of some of the biggest opportunities in my function (India SMB Advertiser Services).  
 
->India Site Workflow Lead (in SMB Advertiser Services function)  
- Heading the workflow team for all the English speaking markets (with a function employee strength of 150) 
- Capacity Planning for the coming quarters 
- Handling stakeholder management  
 
->India Site Vendor Operations Lead Role (in SMB Advertiser Services function)  
- Being a Googler contact between our vendor partners and our management 
- Delivering outstanding results within the limited time  
- Owning the metrics for the vendor teams and coming up with strategies in improving it Adwords Associate Strategist Google July 2011  –  April 2013  (1 year 10 months) Hyderabad Area, India In this role, I've got a chance to learn in depth about the Google AdWords product and understand the internet marketing space. -> Team Level Workflow Lead Role  
- Newbie team was handling AdWords Accounts for newly on-board AdWords advertisers  
- Handled the operations and workflow for the team of 28 people  
 
-> India site CSAT Lead (for SMB Advertiser Services function)  
- Worked with my manager (Prafulla Rawal) for coming up with strategies in improving the CSAT for the overall function

Also, I was one of the youngest business leaders at Google Asia by virtue of 5 promotions in 6 years.
